ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Jefferson Park, Milwaukee, Lawrence and Central: due to, street blockage near Gale/Milwaukee.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/95th
ShortDescription: NB 28 Stony Island buses are rerouted via 103rd, Yates, 100th, Van Vissingen, Jeffery, 93rd and Stony Island: due to, street blockage near Stony Island/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Yates, 100th, Van Vissingen, Jeffery, 93rd and Stony Island, due to street blockage near Stony Island/95th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Line trains are running w/residual delays at Irving Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Line trains are running with residual delays at Irving Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
